PRODUCTS

NMC Cloud provides computing, storage, and networking solutions tailored for businesses looking to optimize their IT infrastructure and operations. Below are the key offerings in these areas

  • Compute
  • Windows Instances
  • Kubernetes Services

Virtual Machines (VMs): These are software-based simulations of physical computers, offering flexibility for running applications and hosting services.

Key Features
  1. Configurations can range from small, general-purpose instances to large, compute or memory intensive setups.
  2. NMC Cloud offers VMs with varied configurations, including vCPU, RAM and storage options tailored to workloads.
  3. Scalable processing power.
  4. Pre-configured operating systems.
  5. Ideal for running enterprise applications, testing, and development environments.

Virtual machines running licensed Windows Server operating systems. These instances are optimized for business requiring windows-based environments for applications, development, or database hosting.

Key Features
  1. Ideal for businesses using Windows-based applications and services
  2. Full support for Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) for easy remote access.
  3. Integration with Microsoft services like Active Directory, SQL Server, and .NET applications.
  4. Pre-installed options for database servers or application servers.
  5. Pay-as-you-go licensing for cost efficiency.

NMC Cloud offers Managed Kubernetes platform for deploying, scaling, and managing containerized applications.

Key Features
  1. Automatic scaling of workloads and clusters.
  2. Automated updates and maintenance with minimal downtime.
  3. Integration with cloud ecosystem. Compatible to NMCs storage, monitoring, and networking tools.
  4. Easy to use: Simple UI, CLI, and API for managing Kubernetes clusters.

Storage

  • Block and File Storage
  • Used for attaching additional volumes to virtual machines.
  • Ideal for databases, transactional systems, and mission-critical applications.
  • Provides high IOPS (Input/Output Operations Per Second) for demanding workloads.
  • Shared file systems accessible across multiple instances.
  • Suitable for collaboration, content management systems, and shared file repositories.
  • Object Storage
  • Designed for unstructured data like media files, backups, and archives.
  • Scalable and cost-effective, accessible via APIs for integration with applications.
  • Snapshots and Backups
  • Daily Backups with Modern Storage Infrastructure
  • Configurable Backup Windows
  • Instant and Recurring Snapshots

Key Features

  • High Performance and Scalability
  • 1. Supports dynamic scaling to meet growing data needs.
  • 2. Offers performance tiers to balance cost and speed.
  • Data Protection
  • 1. Regular snapshots and backups for disaster recovery
  • 2. Redundancy with erasure coding for enhanced data reliability.o Redundancy with erasure coding for enhanced data reliability.
  • Seamless Integration
  • 1. Works seamlessly with other NMC Cloud services like compute and Kubernetes.
  • Global Availability
  • 1. Data stored close to end users with multiple data center locations worldwide.

Networking

NMC Cloud offers a comprehensive suite of networking solutions that enable secure, scalable, and efficient connections within its cloud ecosystem. These services ensure seamless communication between applications, data, and users across the globe.

Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

1. Allows users to create isolated network environments for better control and security.
2. Enables subnetting, routing, and private IP allocations.

Load Balancing

1. Distributes incoming traffic across multiple servers for high availability and reliability.
2. Supports automatic failover to minimize downtime.

DNS Management

1. Simplifies domain name management with quick configurations for custom domains.
2. Offers high-speed DNS routing for improved performance.

Cloud Firewalls

1. Offers advanced firewall solutions to protect workloads from unauthorized access.
2. Configurable rules to manage inbound and outbound traffic.

DDoS Protection

1. Mitigates Distributed Denial of Service attacks to maintain system uptime.
2. Provides proactive monitoring and traffic filtering.

Global Content Delivery Network (CDN)

1. Reduces latency by caching content in data centers closer to end-users.
2. Improves load times for websites and applications.

Key Features

Scalability

Easily scale up or down based on your workload needs

Performance

Optimized infrastructure for high computational performance.

Security

Advanced security features like firewalls, encryption, and controls.

Cost-Effectiveness

Pay only for the resources you actually utilize.
